Our powerful platform combines AI-powered digital analytics and marketing automation to collect customer data, extract insights, and trigger highly personalized campaigns across email, SMS, apps, and websites. 
 
Our platform helps B2C and D2C companies:

- Unify customer data from various sources like websites, eCommerce, loyalty platforms, CRMs, and mobile apps, build customer profiles, and enrich these with compliant first-party data collection. 
 
- Convert data into actionable insights around each customer's socio-demographic, behavior, and preferences to create engaging online and offline experiences. 
 
- Personalize content using these customer insights and automate cross-channel marketing across your website, emails, SMS, mobile/web push notifications, and in-app messages. 
 
- Continuously monitor and optimize your campaigns with the help of AI to help drive high engagement, capitalize on new opportunities, activate churning customers, and build customer loyalty.  
 
More than 700 companies choose Mapp for their marketing needs, including well-known brands such as Ella's Kitchen, Farrow & Ball, Furla, Admiral Group, GLD Group, Pan Macmillan, Pladis, and many more.  
We've been on the market for over 20 years and constantly innovate our products and services to ensure our clients have the best support, with our global offices in London, San Diego, Berlin, Munich, Milan, and Paris.
